item.title: Baloo and NodeJs
item.description: I took some time to write some very basic nodejs bindings for Baloo. They are available on github and npm. Example It can be installed via npm install baloo var Baloo = require('baloo'); var query = new Baloo.Query('keyword'); query.exec(function(results) { results.forEach(function(filePath) { console.log(filePath); }); }); I’m aware of a few people who have deployed Baloo on a server. I’m hoping this will help them. It also paves the way for some interesting web-based user interfaces for file-searching.
